evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS services including Lambda and RDS for serverless applications and databases.
GFG Benefits supports X12 EDI transactions for healthcare claims management.
GFG employs HL7 FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
Event-driven architecture is implemented for real-time data processing.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 transactions in their tech stack, indicating a strong focus on healthcare data exchange.
